## Loading and preprocessing the data
```{r}
data <- read.table("activity.csv", header = T,sep=',')
hData <- filter(data, !is.na(steps))
hDataDaily <- group_by(hData,date)
```

Histogram of the total number of steps taken each day
```{r}

sumByDay <- summarize(hDataDaily,totSteps=sum(steps))
qplot(x=date, y=totSteps, data = sumByDay) + geom_bar(stat="identity")
```


## What is mean total number of steps taken per day?
```{r}
summarize(hDataDaily,meanSteps=mean(steps))
ms <- summarize(hDataDaily,medianSteps=median(steps))


```
